name: Itsy Bitsy and Friends
description:
Charged by a remix of famous nursery rhymes, Itsy-Bitsy Spider brings several mini-games to have fun playing our favorite childhood songs.

Team?

Ana Carolina G. de Campos - Magé, RJ, Brazil - Art Designer

Caio Hudson Morais Silva - Brasilia, DF. Brazil - Coder

Gabriel Rocha Fontenele  - Brasilia, DF. Brazil - Coder

Luísa Cardoso - São Paulo, SP, Brazil - Game Designer e Producer

Pedro Ferreira Tepedino Martins - Brasilia, DF. Brazil - Coder Consultant

Renata Rinaldi - Brasilia, DF. Brazil  - Art Designer

Thomaz Magalhães - São Paulo, SP, Brazil - Sound Designer
